Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for Ganon's Castle#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Forest Trial)

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Double Defense#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: I am the King of Gossip Stones, but fear not - I have the common touch! That means I can make conversation with everyone^from foreign dignitaries to the lowliest bumpkin - such as yourself!

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Boomerang# can be found in #Goron City#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest
